sentences.sContent: They washed their faces and went to bed.
sentences.sCn: 他们洗过脸后上床睡觉去了。

sentences.sContent: The twins spend all their time together.
sentences.sCn: 这对双胞胎总是待在一起。

sentences.sContent: People had moved back into their own homes.
sentences.sCn: 人们搬回了自己的家中。

trans.tranOther: belonging to or connected with people or things that have already been mentioned
